title: Looking for Top+Jungler for Flex
body:
We need a Jungler and Top laner who can play a handful of champs well.
We play most days if not all
You need discord and a mic.
Rank doesnt matter too much just need those roll players 
Add me ign; Prxblems
or leave a comment

replies.body: I main top, not sure what elo you are. But im almost gold just for your assurance.
I'm a top lane main and I'll do it.  I'll add you in a bit.
